name: GX Software
tag_list: wcm, wem, online-marketing, interactive-marketing, cross-channel-marketing, content-management, online-engagement
overview:
GX Software, a company with great innovative ideas and phenomenal solutions for online marketers, content- and e-business managers. We deliver standard solutions to organizations so they can maximize the effectiveness of their online customer dialogues and boost their online results.

Our solutions (GX WebManager WCM and BlueConic) help our customers to increase traffic through multiple online channels and maintain and publish persuasive content in the most effective way. These solutions allow our customers to learn from relevant dialogues with individual online visitors and social peers to dramatically improve conversion. Additionally, our solutions help prepare our customers to outperform the competition in a fast growing online economy.

With a large group of highly qualified web software specialists and an experienced executive team of internet industry veterans, we are proud to serve a fast growing number of medium- to large-sized companies across various different industries that are proven or potential online award winners in their specific segments.
